ygData.subject: Who uses what?
ygData.msgSnippet: Enchanters use Pages Magicians use Words Necromancers use Words Wizards use Runes I think that both Magicians and Necromancers use words since they are both
ygData.messageBody:
Enchanters use Pages
Magicians use Words
Necromancers use Words
Wizards use Runes

I think that both Magicians and Necromancers use words since they are both
essentially pet using classes so some of their words may over lap. I have
herd that some words are only used for Magicians and some are onely used
for Necromancers.

Lomack

>Ok need solid info on what classes uses what components, please no

>

> Necros use words
>
>
